ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Research Panel - Queue
ModMetaData.author: ComradeAlexey
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]WIP!!![/h1] [hr][/hr] [h2]Description[/h2] Adds a queue to the research panel.
Hold [b][u]Left Shift[/u][/b] and [b][u]Left-click[/u][/b] on the desired research to add/remove research to the queue. [hr][/hr] [h2]Compatibility[/h2] The mod should be compatible with all mods. But, if you found an incompatible one, please report it.
[h2]Incompatibility[/h2] [list] [*][b]Research Tree[/b] [*][b]ResearchPal[/b] [*]Others replacing the vanilla research panel. [/list] [hr][/hr] [h2]I found a bug![/h2] For all errors write in the comments attaching the log. Messages along the lines of "everything is broken, author be damned" will be ignored!
